name: Maze runner. Endless labyrinth
description:
The race for gold begins! Amazing run in a labyrinth with traps and cunning enemies. How far can you go on the sophisticated labyrinths and find all treasure chests? An endless labyrinth with dragons is waiting for you!
Explore all back alley and secret passages. Conquer new levels. Look for exits from maze adventure games, collect coins and win prizes! You feel like a treasure hunter!
But remember - dragons don’t sleep in labyrinths, and then there live not only dragons…
Outwit all enemies - inhabitants of labyrinth, flee from the fire-breathing dragons that guard treasure chests, experience your mind and savvy. A set of powerful spells will help you cheat, freeze or even incinerate insidious opponents. But you need to shoot spells with the mind - they can end!

The goal of the game is to run and collect coins, open chests with treasures and go as far as possible through tangled labyrinths.

Features:
• Understandable interface - a finger maze, where the hero needs to be driven by a finger;
• Simple, but fascinating endless maze with treasures and dragons;
• Many levels of different complexity;
• Choice of character to passing the maze;
• Many prizes and bonuses;
• Powerful spells to fight enemies;
• Different enemies are stupid, clever and insidious.

Bright and funny, this game for all, who like to solve puzzles!
We wish you an exciting journey through labyrinths!
